name: Ark Survival Ascended
plot_summary: Reborn amidst neon-drenched jungles and thunderous roars, you stand a stranger on a primeval ark â€“ will you conquer this dinosaur paradise with fangs and fire, or fall prey to its wild beauty?

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
plot_summary: Amidst the fading era of the American Wild West, "Red Dead Redemption 2" unfolds the gripping tale of Arthur Morgan, a seasoned outlaw entrenched in the life of crime and loyalty.
